title: About Me
description: Hello, Iâ€™m an independent researcher and educator in the field of Data Driven Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence and Cognitive Sciences with the focus of promoting next generation startups and companies and helping existing ecosystems to transition into the Artificial Intelligence based ecosystems. I work under the banner of StatsMatter, and provide services such as :

content.title: WORKSHOPS & EVENTS
content.description: Most helpful for beginners. A Gentle introduction's to complex concepts and ideas related to Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning.

content.title: DATA DRIVEN PRODUCTS CONSULTANT & EDUCATOR
